para.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:
"All-terrain vehicle" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 50-2201.02(2).
"Bicycle" shall have the same meaning as provided in 18 DCMR § 9901.1.
"Dirt bike" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 50-2201.02(6).
"Electric mobility device" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 50-2201.02(6A).
"Motor vehicle" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 50-1301.02(4).
"Motorcycle" shall have the same meaning as provided in 18 DCMR § 9901.1.
"Motorized bicycle" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 50-2201.02(11A).
"Motor-driven cycle" shall have the same meaning as provided in 18 DCMR § 9901.1.
"Pedestrian" shall have the same meaning as provided in 18 DCMR § 9901.1.
"Personal mobility device" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 50-2201.02(13).
"Public highway" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 50-1301.02(9).
"Sidewalk" shall have the same meaning as provided in 18 DCMR § 9901.1.

"Vulnerable user" means an individual using an all-terrain vehicle, bicycle, dirt bike, electric mobility device, motorcycle, motorized bicycle, motor-driven cycle, non-motorized scooter, personal mobility device, skateboard, or other similar device.
